name: The Last Human (Wowasaur)
description:
Releasing December 5th

Can you handle being the last human alive? Make your way through three unique dungeon areas to find a way to restore humanity! However, beware the consequences...

----------------

NEW FEATURES

Faster gameplay

New puzzles

3 unique areas to explore

New mechanics

All new HARDCORE mode

----------------

Game by Wowasaur

----------------

CONTROLS

A and D - Move

SPACE - Jump

ENTER - Interact with objects

LEFT CLICK - Interact with objects on the wall

V1.1 fixes - Debug Problem Fixed
